text: I had this take away. While it was a nice basic soup, i think there is nothing more special to it. Maybe I need to eat it at the food court.

The peeled chilli chicken soup is definitely the star of the show.

There is so much complexity and depth to this dish & unlike any other soups I've tried. Sweet, savoury, umami, and a little spicy.

ç§¦æ±¤QinTang offers a true taste of Taiwan! The dishes are flavorful and authentic, especially the nourishing chicken soups, which are both delicious and comforting. Perfect spot in Singapore for those craving genuine Taiwanese snacks and meals. Highly recommend for anyone looking to enjoy quality food!ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡¼
Very nourishing peeled chilli soup, but the chicken pieces were burnt (could be due to reheating in a small pot) and dry. Worth a try if around the area.

We visited Qin Tang at Food Dynasty Cenileisure lately. Tried their Pepper Bakuteh and Braised Pork Rice. Soup is a bit too heavy for us, a bit too much of pepper. Pork ribs not soft enough. We like their Braised Pork Rice. We like their nice environment too.
